name: hashi-template
description: A template for the package marikobot-hashi.
author: Elouann H. (https://github.com/elouannh)

scripts.clean: npm run prettier && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run run-builder && tsc && git add .
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git commit -m "[BUILD] Automatic build"
scripts.post-version-push: git add . && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-prerel: npm version prerelease --preid=prerelease && npm run post-version-push
